content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hello!!

Using a conversational style focused on observation encourages a deeper interaction with the droodle, as it prompts the user to explore its nuances and generate creative thoughts. This method not only fosters engagement but also enhances their understanding of how specific elements might inspire or lead to clever captions, making the process of capturing the essence of the droodle more enriching and collaborative.
